text: The 2023 BWF World Championships is a badminton tournament which will be held in Copenhagen, Denmark. ==Host city selection== Copenhagen was awarded the event in November 2018 during the announcement of 18 major badminton event hosts from 2019 to 2025. ==References== Category:BWF World Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by Denmark Category:Badminton tournaments in Denmark Category:Sport in Copenhagen BWF World Championships BWF World
title: 2023 BWF World Championships
